name: domtastic
description: Small, fast, and modular DOM and event library for modern browsers.

scripts.bundle: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.full.js --debug --standalone domtastic | bin/defaultify.js domtastic $ | exorcist dist/domtastic.js.map > dist/domtastic.js && fix-sourcemaps --sourcemap dist/domtastic.js.map --file domtastic.js
scripts.bundle-min: npm run bundle && cd dist && uglifyjs --in-source-map domtastic.js.map --source-map domtastic.min.js.map -m -c --screw-ie8 -o domtastic.min.js
scripts.coverage: npm run bundle && istanbul instrument dist/domtastic.js > dist/domtastic.instrumented.js && mocha-phantomjs ./test/index.html?cov -R ./test/lib/istanbul-reporter.js --file ./coverage/coverage.json && istanbul report --root ./coverage/
scripts.benchmark: npm run bundle-min && phantomjs ./node_modules/benchrunner/benchrunner.js benchmark/init.js benchmark/class.js benchmark/construct.js benchmark/dom.js benchmark/selector.js
scripts.build-release: bin/bundles.sh; npm run transpile-cjs; npm run transpile-amd
